DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy intravitreal bevacizumab injection treatment proliferative diabetic retinopathy ( PDR ) new dense vitreous hemorrhage ( VH ) previous full panretinal photocoagulation ( PRP ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator carry prospective study patient PDR prior complete laser treatment present new dense VH . All eye treat intravitreal injection bevacizumab ( 1.25 mg ) . Complete ophthalmic examination and/or ocular ultrasonography perform baseline 1 , 6 , 12 week 6 , 9 , 12 month first injection . Re-injection do non-clearing recurrent VH .
